text: Kɨ bizir kaba bagha deravɨra nɨghnɨgha ghua kamaghɨn fos, Godɨn damazimɨn derazir gumazamiziba ko, gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itiba ko, me amir biziba, da bar Godɨn agharimɨn iti. God uabɨ, gumazamizibagh ifongezir arazim ko gumazamizibagh ifongezir puvatɨzir arazim gamizɨ da otifi. Guizbangɨra, e gumazamiziba fozir pu, bizir tiziba gɨn otivam.
